help.short: ExpressRoute port name.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="circuits">
<prop type="array" name="links" identifiers="name">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: ExpressRoute port name.
ExpressRoute port name.

argGroup.arg: <help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>

help.short: Bandwidth of the circuit. Usage: INT {Mbps,Gbps}. Defaults to Gbps.
Encapsulation method on physical ports. Allowed values: Dot1Q, QinQ.
The name of the peering location that the port is mapped to physically.
Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.
Resource ID.
The identity of ExpressRoutePort, if configured.

The type of identity used for the resource. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the virtual machine.

The list of user identities associated with resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="circuits">
<prop type="array" name="links" identifiers="name">

The type of identity used for the resource. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the virtual machine.

The list of user identities associated with resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

help.short: ExpressRoute port name.
Name of child port resource that is unique among child port resources of the parent.
The connectivity association key (CAK) ID that stored in the KeyVault.
Cipher Method. Allowed values: GcmAes128, GcmAes256, GcmAesXpn128, GcmAesXpn256.
The connectivity key name (CKN) that stored in the KeyVault.
Sci mode. Allowed values: Disabled, Enabled.
Resource ID.
Enable/Disable administrative state of an ExpressRoute Link. Allowed values: Disabled, Enabled.

<prop type="array" name="links" identifiers="name">
